Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: (\{ "members", "Welcome my lovelies. Throughout the next week or so I will be finalizing prices and inventory. If you need anything do not hesitate to write me.\\r\\n\\r\\n~Faith", (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ "visitors", "\Price List of Dyes:\
\\r\\n***NOTE: The price is -per use-, not per bottle of dye.***\
\\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\nBlue\
\\r\\nfree: blue\
\\r\\n1 denarii: bright blue, light blue, dark blue\
\\r\\n3 denarii: sky blue, cyan\
\\r\\n5 denarii: vibrant blue, cadet blue, navy blue, peacock, sapphire, turquoise, dark turquoise, cobalt blue, indigo\
\\r\\n7 denarii: blue-grey, baby blue, viridian\
\\r\\n10 denarii: royal blue, blue-green, blue-violet\
\\r\\n40 denarii: satiny blue(limited supply)\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nGreen\
\\r\\nfree: green\
\\r\\n1 denarii: dark green, light green\
\\r\\n3 denarii: olive green, bright green\
\\r\\n5 denarii: peacock green, vibrant green, sage\
\\r\\n7 denarii: viridian, clover-green , chartreuse, apple-green, light sage, blue-green\
\\r\\n10 denarii: emerald, jade, sea green, spring green, mint green, pale mint green\
\\r\\n40 denarii: seafoam green (limited supply)\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\nRed\
\\r\\nfree: red\
\\r\\n1 denar: bright red, light red, dark red\
\\r\\n3 denarii: crimson, ruddy red\
\\r\\n5 denarii: blood-red, rose red, vibrant red, maroon, rust red\
\\r\\n7 denarii: scarlet, strawberry red, dark scarlet, pale rose red\
\\r\\n10 denarii: blush-red, ruby red, red-violet\
\\r\\n40 denarii: blushed rose (limited supply)\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nPink\
\\r\\n3 denarii: pink, pale pink, light pink, bright pink\
\\r\\n5 denarii: pastel pink, rose red, magenta\
\\r\\n7 denarii: soft pink, dark pink, dark salmon\
\\r\\n10 denarii: vibrant pink, blush-red, carnation pink, hot pink\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nYellow\
\\r\\nfree: yellow\
\\r\\n1 denar: bright yellow, light yellow, dark yellow\
\\r\\n3 denarii: flaxen yellow, scuzzy yellow, canary yellow\
\\r\\n5 denarii: goldenrod, vibrant yellow\
\\r\\n7 denarii: gamboge, chartreuse\
\\r\\n10 denarii: saffron, cream\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nOrange\
\\r\\n1 denar: orange\
\\r\\n3 denarii: bright orange, dark orange, bright orange, pumpkin-colored, light orange, carrot orange\
\\r\\n5 denarii: vibrant orange, tangerine\
\\r\\n7 denarii: burnt orange, bittersweet orange\
\\r\\n10 denarii: saffron, peach\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nBrown\
\\r\\n1 denar: brown\
\\r\\n3 denarii: tan, light brown, brown, russet, dark brown, sable, wheat-colored\
\\r\\n5 denarii: sandy brown, goldenrod, sienna maroon\
\\r\\n7 denarii: beige, ochre, ecru, khaki\
\\r\\n10 denarii: cinnamon, rich brown\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nPurple\
\\r\\n3 denarii: purple, dark purple, light purple\
\\r\\n5 denarii: lavender, plum-colored, bright purple, indigo\
\\r\\n10 denarii: violet, amethyst, imperial purple, vibrant purple, lavender rose, orchid purple, indigo purple\
\\r\\n50 denarii: iridescent iris (limited supply)\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nBlack\
\\r\\nfree: black\
\\r\\n5 denarii: charcoal black\
\\r\\n7 denarii: ebony, sooty black, dingy black\
\\r\\n10 denarii: jet black\
\\r\\n15 denarii: obsidian black\
\\r\\n20 denarii: raven\
\\r\\n40 denarii: midnight black (of limited supply)\
\\r\\n85 denarii: iridescent black (of limited supply)\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nWhite\
\\r\\nfree: white\
\\r\\n3 denarii: grubby white\
\\r\\n5 denarii: bright white, pearl, beige\
\\r\\n7 denarii: vibrant white, pearly white, chalky white\
\\r\\n10 denarii: alabaster, ivory, frosted white\
\\r\\n40 denarii: pristine white (limited supply)\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nMetallic\
\\r\\n7 denarii: bronze, silver\
\\r\\n10 denarii: copper-colored\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nGrey\
\\r\\n3 denarii: light grey, grey, dark gray, slate-grey\
\\r\\n5 denarii: ash grey\
\\r\\n7 denarii: lavender grey, blue-grey\
\\r\\n10 denarii: dusky grey, smoky grey, rose grey\
\\r\\n\
" \})
(\{ "visitors", "We are currently under construction on this page, please come back soon or write Miss Faith via courier.", (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})
